trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.
The automation peer that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref> that holds the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref>.

Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Group"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets the class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.
The class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the , , , or value; otherwise, `null`.
Hides all controls that are in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
Shows the controls that are in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
The state of the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> into the visible region of the container.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
